heimdallr.name: Heimdallr
heimdallr.title: God of Foresight
heimdallr.description: A god of Ásgarðr, the celestial realm. Has an intellectual nature and can foresee the actions of others.

Castle Hall: So there are renowned strategists in the Order of Heroes, hm? Best be aware that my foresight is infallible.
My king offered up his eye and his life to receive great knowledge... Yet, he desires even more...
Ásgarðr is the pinnacle of the nine realms. I will acknowledge us celestial gods come with a sort of arrogance.
Loki—so chaotic—is the only being whom I cannot predict... I cannot stand her!
I...was wrong... And now, I cannot shake this sense that the course of the world has changed drastically.
Visit: You are right on schedule. It appears [F]predicts well.
Level: I dislike the unexpected. Oh, however... If unplanned events like these are likely occur...
I anticipated this, though it means nothing if I fail to avoid it.
Summon: I am Heimdallr, god of foresight, servant of the king of heaven. I know your next move.
Learn Skill: This power is proof of your accurate predictions. Very good, indeed.
Confession:
The king of heaven, who respects knowledge above all else, trusts but one servant more than any other...
It is me, the god of foresight. And there is more to me than foreseeing the future.
One is able to proceed precisely on schedule when prepared to avoid anything that obstructs the plan.
Therefore, I dislike people engaging in actions that are not a part of that plan. It disrupts my peace...
I do hope, as my new master, that you are not such a disorderly person as this, [S].
Status: I am Heimdallr, god of foresight. Be aware that I predict the future.
Humph. I knew that would be your next move.
Why could I not predict your actions? Who are you?
If one predicts accurately based on the facts, the future becomes an open book.
As long as things go according to plan, one can be at peace.
Loki... Why must you always meddle with the plan?
Ponder, predict, then fight. It seems we agree on these fundamentals, so I see no reason we cannot be friends.
